Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
2 AP: 0 essence spell. Favor increases by 1 for each one you use.
3 AP: Chance to cast sustained miracle, ends when concentration broken. Spend essence to improve odds, roll d20s based on favor.
Advantage on skill checks to maintain concentration.
After a creature uses an offensive action against you, you may spend 1 AP to make a ranged attack against Presence against them. If you hit, apply one stack of pacified.
Downtime activity: ask a Yes / No question. Answer you get depends on chance based on your devotion.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
After you successfully cast a miracle, gain the benefits of the Defend action.
You have advantage on all Guidance skill checks made outside of downtime.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Once per rest, you may treat a failure on a Favor check as if it were a success.
Once per rest, you may immediately gain the benefit of the Augury downtime activity specific to your subclass.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
You can sustain two miracles at once.
